text: Allah Taalaa hawayen chalata hai woh abar ko uthati hain phir Allah Taalaa apni mansha kay mutabiq ussay aasman mein phela deta hai aur uss kay tukray tukray ker deta hai phir aap dekhtay hain kay uss kay andar say qatray nikaltay hain aur jinhen Allah chahata hai unn bandon per qoh pani barsata hai to woh khush khush ho jatay hain
